thread.title: This Horror Film Shows What It Would Be Like to Be Pregnant for 5 Years
thread.title_full: This Horror Film Shows What It Would Be Like to Be Pregnant for 5 Years

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: This Horror Film Shows What It Would Be Like to Be Pregnant for 5 Years

organizations.name: national partnership for women and families

text:
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Meet Lauren. Lauren has has been pregnant since 2012. With the same kid. Since neither she nor her husband have paid family leave, she can't afford to have the child. So, she decided to just stay pregnant until she accrues enough vacation to have her baby. Not only is this video from National Partnership For Women and Families social commentary on the United States' disgraceful lack of paid family leave, but it's also a complete and total horror show. Honestly, I can't stomach the thought of being pregnant for nine months â€” can you imagine five years!? I'm crying.
Follow Laura on Twitter .
